bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, Az1 construction, compact race design

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork; full carbon legs, crown and steerer
Specialized Mindset Plus Carbon, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, carbon 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
Specialized Pro, 7050 alloy, short-reach drop, ergonomic top shaping, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
SRAM, integrated exterior cartridge bearings, alloy
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x23C, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x23C, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Body Geometry Toupé Team, super light foam, carbon reinforced base, microfiber cover
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
